text: tilawin ijewoen, kkes ed taklatin nnwen. D Öebbi i wen Iuran. Iêell awen, deffir waya, a ppezhum s wayla nnwen, s lewqama, maççi s lemveôôa. Tid, segsent, ukud tezham, fket asent arrazen nnsent, d aêeppem. Ur illi u$ilif fellawen deg wayen i$ef temwafaqem, deffir uêeppem. Öebbi, s tidep, Izga d Bab n ûûwab, d Amusnaw
